contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 29th day of July, 1997, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED. The order of the Superior Court is reversed. Commonwealth v. Banks, 540 Pa. 453, 658 A.2d 752 (1995); Commonwealth v. Carter, 543 Pa. 510, 673 A.2d 864 (1996).
CASTILLE, J., dissents.
